quotes.quote: Love is looking at the same mountains from different angles.
Look at situations from all angles, and you will become more open.
View life through a wide angle lens attitude and see your horizons broaden.
The state of minds vary according to the angle under which one examines them.
There are an infinity of angles at which one falls, only one at which one stands.
Every fight is one between different angles of vision illuminating the same truth
From some angles, up is toward the earth and down toward the sky, and everything—people, horses, cathedrals, dreams—is suspended over the ceaseless void, barely hanging on.
Every man of genius sees the world at a different angle from his fellows, and there is his tragedy.
The more we view the country through the prism of Aboriginality, the more likely we are to get the angle right.
As you get older, you see the world at a different angle, maybe more cynically, but I just bury my anger.
Everybody has an angle. The only time I say no to an interview is when someone says they don't have an angle. I know right away that that's not honest.
All you need is a bad angle and suddenly youre 30 pounds overweight.
As long as you do the best work that you can and not make it bland... because you're going down a lane that is trying to make everybody happy. You have to take an angle on these things.
Even if someone is already in your market space, ask yourself whether you can approach it from a different angle and thereby secure your own customer base.
The best angle from which to approach any problem is the try-angle.
I suppose my formula might be: dream, diversify and never miss an angle.
Nothing is taboo if you have an angle on it.
A figure with curves always offers a lot of interesting angles.
Creativity arises from our ability to see things from many different angles.
Like many features of a landscape, knowledge looks different from different angles.
What is life but the angle of vision? A man is measured by the angle at which he looks at objects.
If you focus too much on development of the visual angle, it could be a detriment to what you're doing musically.
To knock a thing down, especially if it is cocked at an arrogant angle, is a deep delight of the blood.
From whichever angle one looks at it, the application of racial theories remains a striking proof of the lowered demands of public opinion upon the purity of critical judgment.
You've gotta understand camera angles, camera movement - a kick that may not be very powerful may look very powerful from a certain angle.
I find it easier to approach things from a critical angle that otherwise may seem daunting because I'm used to being scared.
Right angles don't attract me. Nor straight, hard and inflexible lines created by man.
The more angles I see, the more confused I get.
It is, from another angle, an attack on requiring proof in philosophy. And it's also the case, I guess, that my temperament is to like interesting, new, bold ideas, and to try and generate them.

The moral angle to the foreclosure crisis - and, of course, in capitalism we're not supposed to be concerned with the moral stuff, but let's mention it anyway - shows a culture that is slowly giving in to a futuristic nightmare ideology of computerized greed and unchecked financial violence.
